channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Analysis: Taiwan-India Ties Set To Deepen Under Expected Third Modi Term
item.description: Ties between Taipei and New Delhi have improved markedly during the administrations of Tsai Ing-wen and Narendra Modi, says Madhav Das Nalapat, vice chair of Manipal Advanced Resea

item.title: Bluefin Tuna Season Opens in Taiwan
item.description: Bluefin tuna season has opened in the waters off southern Taiwan.

item.title: ITRI Net-Zero Day Highlights Hydrogen Power in Taiwan
item.description: Can Taiwan convince its businesses to go net-zero? The Industrial Technological Research Institute certainly thinks so. Every year it hosts "Net-Zero Day" to showcase the latest in

item.title: TSMC Estimates US$92M in Q2 Losses Due to Hualien Earthquake
item.description: Taiwan's TSMC says this month's magnitude 7.2 earthquake in Hualien has hurt their second quarter earnings. They estimate that they will loss over US$92 million.
